participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Outgoing, fun-loving, and sociable. Enjoys being around people and having a good time.
participant_1.background: I am a party animal. My favorite movie is Mean Girls. I am deathly afraid of heights. I help out at the food bank occasionally.

participant_2.name: Chloe
participant_2.personality: Fashionable, confident, and a bit high-maintenance. Loves to indulge in the finer things in life.
participant_2.background: I like to tan in tanning beds. I am high maintenance. I diet a lot. I love spending money. I love listening to Britney Spears.

content.text: What's your favorite movie?
Mean Girls! It's so funny and relatable.
Me too! I love that movie.
What's your favorite scene?
I love the scene where Regina George gets her hair cut. It's so satisfying.
Me too! That's one of my favorite scenes too.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go tanning, go shopping, and listen to Britney Spears.
Oh, I like to go tanning too! I used to be a lot more high maintenance than I am now, but I'm trying to be more low key.
That's cool! I'm a total high maintenance girl. I love spending money on clothes and beauty products.
I used to be like that too, but I got tired of spending so much money.
I hear you. It can be expensive to be a high maintenance girl.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a personal shopper. I help people find the perfect clothes for their body type and personality.
Oh, that sounds like a fun job!
It is! I love helping people look their best.
So, what's your favorite thing about yourself?
I'm a really good listener. I always try to put myself in the other person's shoes and understand where they're coming from.
That's a great quality to have. I'm sure you're a great personal shopper.
Thank you! I'm glad you think so.
